businessProfile.name: Extreme Pizza
businessProfile.address: 590 S Broadway Ave, Boise, ID 83702, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 590 S Broadway Ave, Boise, ID 83702, USA

reviews.text: The pizza was unfortunately not that extreme. Cool restaurant with relaxed vibes. The service and staff were both awesome. We ordered 3-gluten free crust pizzas and the extreme twisted sticks. Overall the flavors just didn‚Äôt happen. Bland on all 3 and the twisted sticks had minimal cheese and no garlic. Thinking maybe the gluten free crust impacted the overall flavor of the pies. They looked delicious, just think for the price there are much better options in Boise.

Delicious pizza & desserts, friendly & thoughtful staff, nice atmosphere. Pizza is not overly greasy but is still absolutely delicious!
Get the Pow Pow dessert, you will not regret it.

As I went into Extreme Pizza my eyes darted about and the place was immaculate.  When I approached the counter I looked upon their menu to discover 5 vegetarian pizzas.  That‚Äôs more than other restaurants in the area.  I feasted on a Mr. Pestado-head.  When all was said and done I loved Extreme Pizza and I await a rendezvous soon!

My husband could eat pizza everyday if he could. He asked for pizza for lunch today so I stopped into Extreme Pizza to hook my husband up.

Walking in, I was greeted and a beautiful smile. The lady that was working was the only person there but she handled business.  There was a gentleman ahead of me. She got his ordered squared away and then got my order taken care of. We talked about the little coffee joint around the corner from her shop. I told her I was going to grabbed a drink and be right back.

By the time I made it back, my husband's pizza was done.  I have a habit of making sure his food looks like what I had ordered. He works on the other side of town any I don't want to drive back if it's wrong. Opening up that little box, the pizza looked fantastic! There was so much cheese on the pizza.  It was pipping hot just coming out the of oven.

Cheese pull was awesome! The crust was chewy and thin.  The sauce had the right amount of tang to it and the cheese was nicely melted all over the pie. With all of it combined in a bite, it was the perfect sweet and savory combo.  I was able to sneak a small bite and it wa so good! I also grabbed a side of homemade ranch and highly recommend dipping that slice into it.

Come to find out the gal that helped me was the owner. She was so sweet and genuine! Business owners like that make me want to support them even more! If you're over by Broadway and Front street and you want a good pie, make sure you check out Extreme Pizza. So good!
Yes they are extreme and their pizzas are top notch. The sauce and crust is what makes a good pizza and they have that area nailed. The staff were friendly and fast getting my pie ready for me.

editorial_summary.overview: Pizzeria chain specializing in innovative pies customized with unusual toppings.

recentReviews.author: Dani Stephens
recentReviews.text:
My husband could eat pizza everyday if he could. He asked for pizza for lunch today so I stopped into Extreme Pizza to hook my husband up.

Walking in, I was greeted and a beautiful smile. The lady that was working was the only person there but she handled business.  There was a gentleman ahead of me. She got his ordered squared away and then got my order taken care of. We talked about the little coffee joint around the corner from her shop. I told her I was going to grabbed a drink and be right back.

By the time I made it back, my husband's pizza was done.  I have a habit of making sure his food looks like what I had ordered. He works on the other side of town any I don't want to drive back if it's wrong. Opening up that little box, the pizza looked fantastic! There was so much cheese on the pizza.  It was pipping hot just coming out the of oven.

Cheese pull was awesome! The crust was chewy and thin.  The sauce had the right amount of tang to it and the cheese was nicely melted all over the pie. With all of it combined in a bite, it was the perfect sweet and savory combo.  I was able to sneak a small bite and it wa so good! I also grabbed a side of homemade ranch and highly recommend dipping that slice into it.

Come to find out the gal that helped me was the owner. She was so sweet and genuine! Business owners like that make me want to support them even more! If you're over by Broadway and Front street and you want a good pie, make sure you check out Extreme Pizza. So good!

recentReviews.author: Timothy Bird
recentReviews.text: Yes they are extreme and their pizzas are top notch. The sauce and crust is what makes a good pizza and they have that area nailed. The staff were friendly and fast getting my pie ready for me.

recentReviews.author: Matthew Putnam
recentReviews.text:
Delicious pizza & desserts, friendly & thoughtful staff, nice atmosphere. Pizza is not overly greasy but is still absolutely delicious!
Get the Pow Pow dessert, you will not regret it.

recentReviews.author: Chris S
recentReviews.text: The pizza was unfortunately not that extreme. Cool restaurant with relaxed vibes. The service and staff were both awesome. We ordered 3-gluten free crust pizzas and the extreme twisted sticks. Overall the flavors just didn‚Äôt happen. Bland on all 3 and the twisted sticks had minimal cheese and no garlic. Thinking maybe the gluten free crust impacted the overall flavor of the pies. They looked delicious, just think for the price there are much better options in Boise.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 5 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: The staff at Extreme Pizza are consistently described as friendly, thoughtful, and efficient, even when managing alone. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

Extreme Pizza offers a wide variety of vegetarian options, more than other local restaurants, which is a significant draw for customers seeking diverse menu choices. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The pizza crust and sauce are praised for their perfect combination of flavors, creating a delicious and memorable pizza experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
improvementOpportunities: Bland flavors and lack of toppings on gluten-free options - review management can address this concern
Competition/discovery issues in Boise - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area
